product_name: Zamberlan 230 SH Crosser Plus GTX RR Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: A great choice for day hikes and multiday adventures, the Zamberlan 230 SH Crosser Plus GTX RR hiking boots are lightweight and responsive, yet offer amazing stability and protection,. Cordura nylon uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays for lightweight support and stability; Kevlar rands protect feet from rocks and roots. Gore-Tex(R) waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Nylon linings wick moisture away from feet and are highly breathable for comfort. Dual-density EVA midsoles provide lightweight cushioning. Nylon shanks increase the stability and support of the Zamberlan 230 SH Crosser Plus GTX RR hiking boots. Vibram rubber outsoles are enhanced with thermoplastic urethane stabilizers for control on uneven surfaces.
short_description: A great choice for day hikes and multiday adventures, the Zamberlan 230 SH Crosser Plus GTX RR hiking boots are lightweight and responsive, yet offer amazing stability and protection,.
